# Unicode.GeneralCategory.connectorPunctuation

**Case**

A connecting punctuation mark, like a tie.

## Declaration

```swift
case connectorPunctuation
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Connector_Punctuation` (abbreviated `Pc`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.connectorPunctuation
